overview: Love vs. sex. Geeks vs. punks. Featuring comic book virgin love with twice the lesbians and double the robots. The award-winning short film is now a full-length feature film including the actress Maria Skorobogatov from Silence of the Lambs. The film premiered at San Francisco Bay Con to eager & happy fans. Now you can experience the comics, romance and comedy first hand with Geek Loves Punk.
title: Geek Loves Punk
